export default function About({ setPage }) { return (

About Us

Archonik Consulting is a team of industry veterans helping studios of all sizes plan and execute high-quality game releases.

Our experience across AAA and complex multiplayer games helps you avoid pitfalls on your way to launch.

Our Team

Rolf Mohr — Creative Director

33 years of experience across Disney, DreamWorks, Insomniac.

Herrick Erickson-Brigl — Executive Producer

Led teams on LEGO, PGA, TopSpin titles.

Mike Anstine — Technical Director

Engineering leadership across 2K, Marvel, Firaxis.

Myles Murphy — Release Operations

10 years of PC release operations at 2K.

); }
